plugins.name: Special characters
plugins.description: Allows for inserting special characters via a dropdown. This is the core part of the feature. Add plugins like special characters essentials or special characters currency to fill it with some characters.

plugins.name: Special characters essentials
plugins.description: Adds a basic set with the most popular characters to the special characters feature.

plugins.name: Special characters arrows
plugins.description: Adds the arrows category and signs to the special characters feature.

plugins.name: Special characters currency
plugins.description: Adds the currency category and signs to the special characters feature.

plugins.name: Special characters latin
plugins.description: Adds the Latin category and characters to the special characters feature.

plugins.name: Special characters mathematical
plugins.description: Adds the mathematical category and symbols to the special characters feature.

plugins.name: Special characters text
plugins.description: Adds the text category and characters to the special characters feature.
